patterns: What is the name of your platform?
What's the name of the product?
responses: Our platform is called Zemen Bazaar eCommerce Platform.

patterns: What is Zemen Bazaar eCommerce Platform?
responses: Zemen Bazaar eCommerce Platform brings delivery agents, vendors, and customers together in a common digital marketplace to enable the fast and efficient exchange of goods and services.

patterns: What features does your platform have?
List the features of Zemen Bazaar
Tell me about the system's key features
responses: Zemen Bazaar includes features like: Intuitive Interface, User & Account Management, Product Management, Order Management, Delivery Management, Payment Management, Social Media Integration, Product Recommendations, and Interactivity tools like theme switching, wishlist, multi-language, chat, contact, and search.

patterns: How does Zemen Bazaar help vendors?
responses: Vendors can increase sales, gain visibility through ads, track customer preferences with analytics, and engage more buyers with repeat promotions and product recommendations.

patterns: Why should I shop on Zemen Bazaar?
responses: Buyers enjoy a wide product selection, competitive pricing, 2-hour average delivery time, personalized recommendations, discounts, and insights to make informed shopping decisions.

patterns: What are the benefits for delivery agents?
Why join as a delivery agent?
responses: Delivery agents can earn weekly through flexible jobs, manage routes efficiently using our mobile app, and improve delivery speeds with optimized tools.

patterns: Who can sell on Zemen Bazaar?
responses: Our target vendors include: local retailers, new business entrants, artisans and indigenous creators, manufacturers, and business associations like chambers of commerce.
We target tech-savvy young adults (18-35), urban shoppers, busy professionals, and families looking for reliable products and quick delivery.

patterns: Who can become a delivery agent?
responses: Delivery agents include freelancers, students, part-timers, local drivers, and vehicle owners such as motorcycle, Bajaj, or car drivers who know their areas well.
Welcome to ZemenBazaar.com! Browse a wide range of products organized in categories to help you find what you need.
You can register using your mobile phone number. We’ll send you an OTP to verify your identity and secure your account.
You can select products by browsing our catalog. Each item includes images, descriptions, and prices. Just choose your item and quantity!
Once you select your items, proceed to checkout. You’ll confirm your order details and note the order code for reference.

You can choose Pre-Delivery Payment or Payment on Delivery. The vendor’s and delivery agent’s phone numbers will be provided for communication. Make sure to get the payment receipt from the respective party.

patterns: I want to become a delivery agent
responses: Choose 'Become a Delivery Agent' on our platform. Provide your contact and vehicle details, agree to the terms, and pay the registration fee to get started.

patterns: How do delivery agents find the best routes?
responses: Our platform uses a route optimization feature to help delivery agents minimize time and transport costs.

patterns: How do agents pick up orders?
responses: Delivery agents are shown the vendor’s and customer’s contact info. They follow the payment type, confirm payment status, and collect items accordingly.
Delivery agents are responsible for safe handling. Vendors must provide genuine products. Any damage during transport is the agent’s responsibility.

patterns: When will I get my item?
responses: Items are delivered within 45 minutes to 2 hours, ensuring fast and efficient service.

patterns: How do I return an item?
responses: If returned for quality issues, the delivery agent returns the item to the vendor. Return shipping costs are shared between the vendor and customer.

patterns: I want to sell on Zemen Bazaar
responses: To become a vendor, click 'Become a Seller' and submit documents like your trade license and VAT registration.

patterns: Do I need to pay to sell?
responses: Yes, vendors must pay subscription, advertising, and product listing fees as per the agreement. You may also opt to pay commission on sales.

patterns: How do I list my products?
responses: After registering and paying fees, vendors can list their products with images, descriptions, and advertisements based on their plan.
Vendors monitor, accept/reject orders, prepare the items, ensure product quality, and hand over to delivery agents.

patterns: Can I use my own delivery agent?
responses: Yes, vendors can use their own agents, but they must register through Zemen Bazaar for tracking and safety purposes.
For Payment on Delivery, delivery agents confirm the vendor receives payment before marking it complete. For Pre-Delivery, vendors must confirm payment within 10 minutes.

patterns: What if customer rejects the item?
responses: Vendors must resolve quality complaints within 3 hours if a customer refuses the product. Ensuring product quality is essential.
